problem.markdown:
1. Buchholz relay is used in
(x) Oil cooled Transformer ( ) Air cooled Transformer ( ) Transmission Line ( ) Generator
2. Buchholz relay operates on the principle of
( ) over current ( ) over voltage (x) Gas ( ) Over power
3. Buchholz relay is installed-
(x) Between of transformer tank and conservator ( ) in the Conservator ( ) in the Main tank ( ) in the Reservoir
4. Buchholz relay is used for protection of transformer from
( ) The flow of excessively high current ( ) Low level of oil in main tank (x) Both (a) and (b) ( ) Excessive high voltage
5. Buchholz relay is
(x) Safety device ( ) Control device ( ) Generating device ( ) Electrical instrument
6. How do we test Buchholz relay during maintenance
( ) Generate air bubbles with pump and force it to Buchholz relay ( ) Reduce oil level in Buchholz relay (x) Both (a) and (b) ( ) None of these
7. Buchholz relay is used to protect from
(x) All internal faults of transformer ( ) All external faults of transformer ( ) Both (a) and (b) ( ) None of these
8. Buchholz relay protects a transformer from
( ) Winding to ground fault ( ) Winding to winding fault ( ) Turn to turn fault (x) All of these
9. Minimum operating time of Buchholz relay is
(x) 0.1 Second ( ) 1 Second ( ) 2 Second ( ) 0.5 Second
10. Average operating time of Buchholz relay is
( ) 1 Second (x) 0.2 Second ( ) 0.1 Second ( ) 5 Second
